Discussion: Patchy fog on Friday morning will give way to mostly cloudy conditions.  The first weekend of 2022 will seem Spring like with rain and temperatures in the 60’s.  A return to winter on Monday as temperatures drop into the mid-30’s with a chance of some morning snow flurries as a storm quickly passes by to the east of the area.  Clear conditions through mid-week.  Expect Good air quality through the weekend into next week.  -MDE
